ai-mil4.4:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, it is because of a spot that elephants tossed with eight reasons.
ai-mil4.4:1.3_0: he goes to the assembly hall with a Buddha awakened for himself; he walks around the swamp, he diverts it down; he diverts to an assembly; he looses to the Buddhas awakened for themselves; he walks around it, drinking and washing water to the feet; he wakes up into a Buddha; he walks to a stirredude, of a Buddha; he flying through the Teaching; he goes to gets the Sangha of monks; he is going to a wanderer.
ai-mil4.4:2.4_0: And with the immaterial jhānas and
ai-mil4.4:3.3_0: Those who have become completely quenched
